title: PHParray_fill_keys()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHParray_fill_keys()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Fill an array with values, specifying keys:
<?php
$keys=array("a","b","c","d");
$a1=array_fill_keys($keys,"blue");
print_r($a1);
?>

Definition and Usage
The array_fill_keys() function fills an array with values, specifying keys.
Syntax
array_fill_keys(
keys, value
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
keys
Required. Array of values that will be used as keys
value
Required. Specifies the value to use for filling the array
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the filled array
PHP Version:
5.2+

★
+1
